title: Remove the silence from Garen's Q
body:
At least it would give some counterplay to react to that bullshit of a champ.
He got Regen, tenacity, extra resistance stats, damage reduction, true damage, CC breaker, armor shred. So why the fu** should he keep his silence?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=She Was A Virgin,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XbGfX0NX,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-09-16T14:29:02.569+0000)
>
> At least it would give some counterplay to react to that bullshit of a champ.

The counterplay is not letting him touch you in the first place. Kiting > All of Garen's entire kit. He gets to do so much when he gets into melee range, because he is pure melee.

> He got Regen, tenacity, extra resistance stats, damage reduction, true damage, CC breaker, armor shred. So why the fu** should he keep his silence?

You know, when you just name out a champion's kit, they all sound broken right?

Lets try it :D

Kats got, hyper mobility, resets, aoe, burst, single target, blinks, dot.

Ashe got, perma slow, long range, scaling crit damage, longest stun in game, global ult, global vision, screen wide poke.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XbGfX0NX,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-09-16T14:59:47.153+0000)

> Kats got, hyper mobility, resets, aoe, burst, single target, blinks, dot.

> Ashe got, perma slow, long range, scaling crit damage, longest stun in game, global ult, global vision, screen wide poke.

Here, I got a better one.

Low cool down dash that can go over walls, seriously, you can get it down to two seconds

Free passive healing

Free crit strike on an ability

One of the longest static ADC ranges, seriously, the only champion that can outrange this one's AAs is Kog'Maw, and that is with an ability

And an AoE prevent death mechanic, who thought making a Kayle ulti AoE and instant was a good idea?

Oh wait, this is Kindred.

A passive that gives him a shield whenever he hits something with his skills
A W that heals him whenever he triggers it, but if he uses it, it's an AoE DoT that both affect an ally and himself
His R can steal an enemy champion from the enemy team
His Q is 3 empowered AA with crazy damage
His E is an AoE spammable ability that triggers his shield up to 100%

how is he ever going to be able to fight champions like lucian, quinn, teemo, vayne, caitlyn etc. when he cant even get half a spin off after they already fucked up and he made it into melee range?

and those are just the ranged champions.

ekko, riven, fiora, zed, talon, renekton even aatrox or even fucking itelia.

he wouldnt be able to fight 90% of the champion pool in this game. youd have to quadrupel his spin damage, just so he gets some damage off after making it past initial enemy kiting.

because slows dont stop dashes. it would completely trash most of his top lane matchups. not to mention how useless it would make him against a majority of the rest of the champion pool.

Silence makes more sense, he doesn't need a slow generally to stay on them once he's on them.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XbGfX0NX,comment-id=0000000300000000,timestamp=2018-09-16T17:49:33.024+0000)

> 
> Silence makes more sense, he doesn't need a slow generally to stay on them once he's on them.

True, but those mobile champions are going to be beating Garen anyway because he just gets kited. It depends on the situation, against mages, silence is better, against say ADCs, the slow is better.

That's my point though.  If Garen hits a mobile champion with bush tactics, he stands a decent chance of killing them with his silence.  If it was a slow, he'd pretty much be unable to threaten mobile champions at all.

Even against adcs, a silence is generally better.  If he's already in melee range, they're going to need a spell to get away.  For instance, would you rather silence or slow the Vayne?  The only exception to this is Kalista.
